full_story: It was a bright and sunny morning in Bedrock, and Fred Flintstone was grumbling, “I don’t want a birthday surprise party!” He stomped around the house, waving his arms. But deep down, he really did want one! His cheerful best friend, Barney Rubble, had a twinkle in his eye. “Don’t worry, Fred! I’ll take you out for a fun day while Wilma and Betty get everything ready!” he said, grinning widely. Just then, Pebbles, Fred and Wilma’s adorable daughter, peeked out from behind Wilma’s legs, giggling. “Daddy, come play!” she squealed. Fred chuckled, ruffling her hair, but he still didn’t want to leave. “Okay, okay, Barney! Let’s go!” he finally said, trying to sound tough but not fooling anyone. As they walked to the bowling alley, Dino, their playful pet dinosaur, wagged his tail and barked excitedly, hoping to join the fun. Meanwhile, back at home, Wilma and Betty were decorating with colorful balloons and a big, delicious cake, whispering and giggling about how surprised Fred would be. “He’s going to love it!” Wilma said, smiling. Finally, after a fun day of bowling and laughter, Barney said, “Time to head back, Fred!” When they arrived home, the lights were off. “What’s going on?” Fred wondered, scratching his head. Suddenly, “Surprise!” Everyone shouted, and Fred’s eyes widened in shock. His grumpy frown turned into a big smile, and he laughed, “I guess I really did want a birthday surprise!” He hugged Wilma tightly, and Pebbles clapped her hands with joy. Dino jumped around barking happily, and even Mr. Slate, who had come to join the fun, smiled at Fred. The party was a hit, filled with laughter, cake, and love, reminding everyone that surprises are always the best!

global_characters_dict.Dino: Dino is a medium-sized, cartoon dinosaur with a long neck and a friendly look. He has a round, plump body with a long, flexible tail and short limbs. His head is large and elongated with a wide mouth and rounded snout. Dino’s neck is very long and slender. His skin is smooth and bright pink with several dark spots on his back. He has small, round eyes set close together, expressive eyebrows, and two small nostrils near the end of his snout. He also has a pair of small, rounded ears on top of his head and a few thin, black hair strands. His toes and fingers are rounded, and his overall posture is upright and cheerful. Dino is a pink dinosaur with black spots on his back and tail. He wears a light blue collar with a yellow tag. His overall look is playful and cartoonish, matching a pet-like character in a prehistoric setting.
global_characters_dict.Betty: Betty is a young woman with a petite frame and soft facial features. She has a slender body with a small waist and long legs. She has a small, oval face with a rounded chin. Her skin is fair and smooth. Betty’s hair is jet black, short, and styled in a neat bob with a slight wave, topped with a small bow. Her eyebrows are thin and arched, and her eyelashes are short. She has large, expressive eyes and a small nose. Her lips are full and usually smiling. Her ears are small and set close to her head. Her fingers are slender, and her overall appearance is gentle and approachable. Betty is wearing a light blue, sleeveless dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a black necklace with a white pendant and a blue bow in her hair. She is barefoot, and her style is casual and primitive.
global_characters_dict.Barney: Barney is a short, stout man with a compact, rounded body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a proportionally large head on a short, thick neck and broad shoulders. His limbs are short and thick, particularly his legs, giving him a sturdy appearance. His posture is relaxed with slightly sloped shoulders. He has fair, smooth skin. Barney’s face is rounded with a prominent, bulbous nose and a small chin. He has small, round eyes and thick, short eyebrows. His blonde hair is neatly cut and styled flat against his head. His ears are small and close to the head. He has a wide smile, showcasing evenly spaced teeth. Barney is wearing a sleeveless, brown tunic that is short and rough-edged, tied at the neck with a simple string. The fabric looks coarse and primitive. He is barefoot, and his outfit has a casual, stone-age style.
global_characters_dict.Fred: Fred is a middle-aged man with a large and broad body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a strong, stocky body with broad shoulders and short, thick legs. His head is large in proportion to his body, with a wide jaw and a pronounced chin. He has a round face and a short neck. His skin is light and smooth. His hair is black, thick, and styled with a simple side part. His eyebrows are bold and slightly arched. He has a wide mouth with visible front teeth and a big smile. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His nose is large and rounded, and his eyes are oval-shaped with small pupils. Fred is wearing a sleeveless, knee-length orange tunic with black spots, made of a rough, stone-age style fabric. He has a blue necktie and is barefoot. His overall style is casual and primitive, matching a prehistoric theme.
global_characters_dict.Slate: Slate is a bald, older man with a short, stout build. He has no beard or mustache. He has a compact, stocky body with short arms and legs and a round torso. His head is large compared to his body, with a pronounced, square jaw and a small chin. His skin is fair and smooth. Slate has a bald head with only a few thin strands of hair at the back. He wears round, black glasses that make his eyes appear larger. His eyebrows are thin and arched, and he has a prominent nose. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His mouth is wide, often seen smiling and showing his upper teeth. Slate is wearing a sleeveless, olive-green tunic with a jagged hem and a large black necktie. He has round glasses and is barefoot. His outfit is simple and primitive, fitting the stone-age style.
global_characters_dict.Wilma: Wilma is a slender woman with a graceful and elegant appearance. She has a slender body with long arms and legs, and her proportions are tall and elegant. Her shoulders are narrow, and her neck is long and thin. She has a small, oval-shaped face and a pointed chin. Her skin is fair and smooth. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and styled in a high bun with a distinct curl at the front. Her eyebrows are thin and curved, and her eyelashes are short. She has small, round eyes and a small nose. Her lips are red and well-defined. Her ears are small and close to her head. Her fingers are long and slim, and she is always in a graceful, upright posture. Wilma is wearing a one-shoulder, white dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a chunky white necklace and is barefoot. Her overall look is minimalist and primitive, fitting a prehistoric theme.
global_characters_dict.Pebbles: Pebbles is a small toddler girl with a round face and a playful expression. She has a chubby, short body with a large head compared to her body, short arms and legs, and a visible baby belly. Her posture is relaxed and playful. Pebbles has fair, smooth skin. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and tied up in a high ponytail with a large white bow. She has fine, short eyebrows and long eyelashes. Her eyes are big and round, and her cheeks are full. She has a small, upturned nose and a wide smile, showing her small teeth. Her ears are small and close to her head.  Pebbles is wearing a sleeveless, bright green top with black spots and blue shorts. She has her orange hair tied up with a large white bone-shaped hair accessory. Her style is cute and playful, fitting for a young child in a stone-age setting. She is barefoot.

His posture is relaxed with slightly sloped shoulders. He has fair, smooth skin. Barney’s face is rounded with a prominent, bulbous nose and a small chin. He has small, round eyes and thick, short eyebrows. His blonde hair is neatly cut and styled flat against his head. His ears are small and close to the head. He has a wide smile, showcasing evenly spaced teeth. Barney is wearing a sleeveless, brown tunic that is short and rough-edged, tied at the neck with a simple string. Betty’s hair is jet black, short, and styled in a neat bob with a slight wave, topped with a small bow. Her eyebrows are thin and arched, and her eyelashes are short. She has large, expressive eyes and a small nose. Her lips are full and usually smiling. Her ears are small and set close to her head. Her fingers are slender, and her overall appearance is gentle and approachable. Betty is wearing a light blue, sleeveless dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. Her fingers are long and slim, and she is always in a graceful, upright posture. Wilma is wearing a one-shoulder, white dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. Her posture is relaxed and playful. Pebbles has fair, smooth skin. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and tied up in a high ponytail with a large white bow. She has fine, short eyebrows and long eyelashes. Her eyes are big and round, and her cheeks are full. She has a small, upturned nose and a wide smile, showing her small teeth. Her ears are small and close to her head.  Pebbles is wearing a sleeveless, bright green top with black spots and blue shorts. She has her orange hair tied up with a large white bone-shaped hair accessory. Her style is cute and playful, fitting for a young child in a stone-age setting. She is barefoot.A festive indoor scene filled with excitement as Fred is taken by surprise by a sudden shout of Surprise! from his friends creating a joyful and celebratory atmosphere. Colorful party decorations such as balloons streamers and a large cake on a table all contributing to the festive mood of the surprise party. Fred is standing in the center his eyes wide open in shock as he processes the surprise. Dino Barney Betty Wilma and Pebbles are around him all smiling and shouting in unison adding to the excitement of the moment. Freds expression is one of astonishment and disbelief with his mouth slightly agape and eyebrows raised. The other characters display joy and enthusiasm with big smiles and sparkling eyes. Fred is at the center of the image slightly leaning back in surprise. Dino is to his left leaning forward with a big grin. Barney is on the right arms raised in celebration. Betty and Wilma are slightly behind Fred clapping and smiling while Pebbles is in the foreground jumping with joy. The setting is a warmly decorated living room with colorful balloons and streamers hanging from the ceiling. A table laden with a birthday cake and party snacks is in the background enhancing the festive atmosphere. Wide shot capturing the entire group in the moment of surprise showing Freds reaction and the joyful expressions of his friends along with the colorful decorations around them.

captions_info.caption: His grumpy frown turned into a big smile as he laughed, “I guess I really did want a birthday surprise!”
captions_info.description: Dino. Dino is a medium-sized, cartoon dinosaur with a long neck and a friendly look. He has a round, plump body with a long, flexible tail and short limbs. His head is large and elongated with a wide mouth and rounded snout. Dino’s neck is very long and slender. His skin is smooth and bright pink with several dark spots on his back. He has small, round eyes set close together, expressive eyebrows, and two small nostrils near the end of his snout. He also has a pair of small, rounded ears on top of his head and a few thin, black hair strands. His toes and fingers are rounded, and his overall posture is upright and cheerful. Dino is a pink dinosaur with black spots on his back and tail. He wears a light blue collar with a yellow tag. His overall look is playful and cartoonish, matching a pet-like character in a prehistoric setting.A cheerful indoor scene where Dino a dinosaur character is experiencing a delightful transformation from a grumpy expression to a joyful smile as he realizes he is receiving a birthday surprise. Colorful birthday decorations including balloons streamers and a large cake with candles are prominently displayed in the background symbolizing the birthday celebration. Dino is laughing heartily his arms raised slightly in excitement as he reacts to the surprise embodying a sense of joy and relief. Dinos face is now bright and animated showcasing a wide smile with sparkling eyes reflecting his newfound happiness and surprise. Dino is positioned in the center of the image slightly leaning forward as he laughs creating a dynamic and engaging focal point. The setting is a festive room decorated for a birthday party with colorful balloons and a table set with a cake and party hats creating a warm and celebratory atmosphere. Medium shot capturing Dinos full body and the vibrant decorations around him emphasizing his joyful expression and the party environment.
